Name: Perfect Date
About the game: Announcing Strip 'Em II: Facka's Game Please consider adding it to your wishlist, it really helps! / Perfect Date is a dating simulator where you will have the chance to prove that you can seduce some of the best-looking girls that you have ever met. For the Early Acces launch, the game consists of over 400 sexy and sexual content renders, loads of animations, 4 different girls that you can seduce, a rich and interesting story, multiple choices that will affect parts of the story, date minigames that will help you on your path to a perfect date. More will be added over the course of the Early Acces period. Date Jess Date Sarah Date Reia Date Parris: Make the right choices and reap your rewards. Hone your massage skills, please them and good things will follow
